heroSection.titleDescription: Brand Strategy forms the foundation that ensures recognition, trust and coherence
heroSection.page-professional-impression: For a good professional first impression
heroSection.page-customer-choice: The customer chooses your service, product or company faster
heroSection.page-efficiency-revenue: Saves time, costs and generates more revenue

sectionTwo.paragraph1: With our approach, we build a strategic foundation that brings everything together: your mission, vision, brand personality, tone of voice and target audience. This way you know exactly how you want your brand to come across and ensure that every touchpoint, from marketing to customer service, is consistent and powerful.
sectionTwo.paragraph2: We look at your market and competition, determine your positioning and create a concrete plan to translate your brand into action. Depending on the package you choose, you receive a complete strategic document, a social media strategy, a planning and even an onboarding deck to bring your entire team along.
sectionTwo.paragraph3: Whether you choose Basic (focus on core and foundation), Standard (with analysis and positioning) or Premium (including action plan, strategy and team presentation), you always get a strategy that makes your brand recognizable, credible and irresistible.

stepSection.description: Our approach is a proven effective process. Each step brings us closer to realizing your goals and vision. That's why we've created a 4-phase approach, ensuring clear management and meeting all expectations.

step1.title: Step 1: Vision & Positioning
step1.content: We start with an extensive intake and one-on-one consultations. Together we map out your brand, target audience and ambitions. This forms the basis to sharply determine who you are, what you want to convey and how you stand out in the market.

step2.title: Step 2: Concept
step2.content: Based on research and analysis, we build the strategic foundation of your brand. Think mission, vision, brand personality, tone of voice and clear target audiences. For more extensive trajectories, we deepen this with market and competitive analyses, positioning, brand story and a concrete social media action plan.

step3.title: Step 3: Feedback & Fine Tuning
step3.content: You receive the first strategic proposals presented. We incorporate your feedback and refine the plan until everything seamlessly aligns with your vision, values and objectives. Depending on the package, multiple correction rounds are possible.

step4.title: Step 4: Delivery
step4.content: The end result is a complete and practical brand strategy document. This contains your brand essence, messaging framework and, if applicable, a social media plan or onboarding deck for your team. This gives you a clear direction and concrete tools to position your brand strongly in the market.

stepSection.buttonText: I want to start right away!

quoteSection.quote: "Products are made in the factory, but brands are created in the mind."
quoteSection.author: Walter Landor

heroSection.titleDescription: All the reasons why your business can't do without it

heroSection.page-efficiency-revenue: Saves time, costs and generates more revenue

section1.title: Brands are very important for businesses
section1.content: Branding ensures that a company or product is recognized. This recognition is important and when properly applied, it can ensure that customers - current and potential - gain trust or, even better, want to become part of the brand.

section2.title: Consistency
section2.content: Branding is a broad concept and consists of various elements (logo, color schemes, typography) that work together to determine the appearance of the company or product. It's important to think about this and document all decisions about the branding. This way you can ensure that what has been decided is also applied consistently.

section3.title: Recognition
section3.content: All decisions regarding branding come together in the corporate identity. And the corporate identity is documented in the Brand Book. A consistent corporate identity is important, because every employee must be able to identify with your brand. So from time to time, clarification of the brand's visualization is necessary.

quoteSection.quote: "A brand is not what you say it is. It is what they say it is."
quoteSection.author: Marty Neumeier

sectionThird.subtitle: A gap that can be solved
sectionThird.paragraph1: A business not being noticed enough is a common problem. This occurs with startups, but also with companies that lack clear direction. Because a strong corporate image is missing, the target audience won't recognize the company or brand.
sectionThird.paragraph2: A corporate identity enables a company to build a strong corporate image with the target audience and influences the attitude and behavior of the organization. It ensures better recognition, allowing the company to stand out from competitors. A professional corporate identity creates trust in the services and products offered, and that's often exactly what you need!
sectionThird.paragraph3: In short: a good corporate identity not only represents an organization's identity, but also strengthens it!

sectionFourth.subtitle: A gap that can be solved
sectionFourth.paragraph1: Our collaborative approach is what makes us unique. We don't just deliver a product, but also ensure that the entire process runs smoothly. First, we want your wishes to be completely clear, then we start working on a proposal that we think fits you.
sectionFourth.paragraph2: We don't just do what's asked of us, but we always think along with you in the process. Through our expertise, we're able to make suggestions that you often haven't thought of before. We always go the extra mile.
sectionFourth.paragraph3: You also get designs from different designers, which brings much more diversity of ideas to the table. This ensures a final result that comes from your wishes and our expertise and advice. Customer satisfaction is the most important thing for us and we work on that together!
sectionFourth.paragraph4: Finally, we are also transparent about our rates.

stepSection.description: Our approach is a proven effective process. Each step brings us closer to realizing your goals and vision. That's why we've created a 4-phase approach, ensuring clear management and meeting all expectations.

step1.title: Step 1: Vision & Positioning
step1.content: We start with a conversation about your brand, target audience and core values. Together we define the brand identity and tone of voice that form the foundation for your brand book. This sets a strong base for a recognizable and consistent brand.

step2.title: Step 2: Graphic Design
step2.content: Based on the strategy, we develop the visual part: logos, colour palette, typography, photography and style elements. Everything is designed with attention to detail and aligned with your brand personality.

step3.title: Step 3: Feedback & Fine‑Tuning
step3.content: You receive the first draft of the brand book and can share your feedback. We incorporate your input and ensure every element perfectly matches your vision and look.

step4.title: Step 4: Delivery
step4.content: The final brand book is delivered as a clear, organised document ready for use within your team or by external partners. Everyone will have a straightforward guide to consistently represent your brand.

stepSection.buttonText: I want to start right away!

heroSection.titleDescription: What does a profitable website mean for your business?
heroSection.page-subtitle: It is much more than a business card, let it function as a marketing machine
heroSection.page-more-leads: Ensures more leads and therefore more customers
heroSection.page-professionalism: Radiates the professionalism of your business
heroSection.page-full-control: Unlike social media platforms, you are in full control
heroSection.page-information-point: Create the most important information point for current customers
heroSection.page-investment: Your website is an investment, not a cost
heroSection.page-future-ready: A website that is set up for the future

sectionTwo.title: A poorly functioning website
sectionTwo.subtitle: Does this sound familiar?
sectionTwo.problem2: The design is no longer current
sectionTwo.problem4: Too much text makes the website unclear
sectionTwo.problem5: Does not work well on mobile devices
sectionTwo.problem6: Does not reflect what the company has to offer
sectionTwo.paragraph1: Too little attention paid to your website results in a major loss of customers, while it should just generate money. We regularly hear that websites are seen as an endless cost, because a party has to be hired for every adjustment. Perhaps you think so too: that it would be easier? For example, by being able to change your website yourself or with an affordable maintenance subscription?
sectionTwo.paragraph2: Or perhaps your website no longer fits your current business operations at all. Every website is built with a specific vision and specific goals. It regularly happens that this does not fit well together. Therefore, it would be more favorable if more thought were given to the business operations, asking questions in advance about the size of the organization and whether a marketing department is present. If this is thought through in the right way, it means you are better prepared to grow.
sectionTwo.paragraph3: So you are probably looking for a party that fully thinks along with your business operations to achieve the best results and is transparent in costs!

sectionThree.title: Others offer what they're good at. We advise what suits you best
sectionThree.paragraph1: At Achieve we have a unique approach. We don't just look at our expertise, we find it more important that the website actually fits your business operations. A website should be a real addition to the business. That's why we always first delve into the company and its objectives, so that we can advise and support in the right way. This approach ensures that all expectations are met and a healthy relationship for the long term is created.
sectionThree.paragraph2: Transparency is also something that characterizes us. You'll notice that immediately, because we don't work with hidden costs, annoying contracts, or other tricks that don't work in your favor. We focus primarily on creating a long-term partnership.
sectionThree.paragraph3: When the website functions well and you're satisfied with it, you can immediately move on to other options and possibilities at Achieve to scale up your business operations. Let us advise you on the possibilities, for example by outsourcing online advertising to increase your visitor flow, and thereby also increase your leads and ultimately increase your revenue!

quoteSection.quote: "Websites promote you 24/7: No employee will do that."
quoteSection.author: Paul Cookson

sectionTwo.title: No one understands you better than we do
sectionTwo.subtitle: Discover the solution!
sectionTwo.paragraph1: You want to get more out of your existing customer base, but it seems challenging to determine where to start. You have an extensive email database, but you lack insight and measurability in your email marketing campaigns. Finding the right KPIs is of great importance to be able to measure and optimize the effectiveness of your efforts.
sectionTwo.paragraph2: It's not only important to know who you have reached, but also who you may have missed. Reaching the right target audience is essential to improve the results of your email marketing. You feel that you are currently not reaching the relevant target audience with your marketing efforts, and that is a missed opportunity!
sectionTwo.paragraph3: We understand that these challenges can be complex, but we are ready to help you. With our expertise and solutions, we can help you get more value from your existing customer base, optimize your email marketing and increase the return on your investment. Together we ensure that you no longer miss opportunities and that your business can grow. Good email marketing not only ensures that part of your marketing efforts are automated, but that it actually generates more leads/sales!

This approach ensures that all expectations are met and a healthy relationship for the long term is created.
sectionThree.paragraph2: Transparency is also something that characterizes us. You'll notice that immediately, because we don't work with hidden costs, annoying contracts, or other tricks that don't work in your favor. We focus primarily on creating a long-term partnership.
sectionThree.paragraph3: When the website functions well and you're satisfied with it, you can immediately move on to other options and possibilities at Achieve to scale up your business operations. Let us advise you on the possibilities, for example by outsourcing online advertising to increase your visitor flow, and thereby also increase your leads and ultimately increase your revenue!

featuresSection.title: What makes us
featuresSection.subtitle: Many reasons why you would like to

feature1.title: Sharpen marketing goals
feature1.description: Are you looking for an email marketing partner who can help you achieve business goals? A...
feature1.fullText: Are you looking for an email marketing partner who can help you achieve business goals? At Achieve we go beyond the inbox. In addition to sending effective emails, we also strive to achieve your marketing objectives. Achieve specializes in email marketing with an integrated marketing strategy, where we ensure that your message reaches the right target audience and delivers results. We understand the importance of an effective email marketing campaign!

feature2.title: Unique and personal approach
feature2.description: We attach great value to creating valuable email experiences for our customers. We do t...
feature2.fullText: We attach great value to creating valuable email experiences for our customers. We do this in various ways. We ensure that the emails are tailored to your individual preferences. The emails are written in the most personal and unique way possible to create a bond of trust. Of course, special discounts and promotions can also be added. We ensure that these benefits are clearly communicated in the emails.

feature3.title: Dissect and define target audiences
feature3.description: Also emphasize what distinguishes your products or services from the competition and why...
feature3.fullText: Also emphasize what distinguishes your products or services from the competition and why they should be with your company. We communicate clearly about the benefits and added value that your company offers. We use advanced criteria to identify specific target audiences and send relevant messages to them. This way we can better respond to the specific needs of different target audiences. We also regularly conduct A/B tests to discover which content and calls to action perform best. These insights are used to continuously optimize the email campaigns. Email marketing is all about delivering value and building lasting relationships.

feature4.title: Laws and regulations in practice
feature4.description: Finally, transparency and trust are important in the world of email marketing. We under...
feature4.fullText: Finally, transparency and trust are important in the world of email marketing. We understand the importance of transparency and are fully aware of the relevant laws and regulations regarding email marketing, such as the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) in Europe. Our goal is not only to conduct effective email marketing campaigns, but also to do so in a legally compliant manner. We will of course inform you about this and it is also possible that we check your privacy policy to make sure that personal data is handled correctly and reputation damage is prevented.

stepSection.description: Our approach is a proven effective process. Each step brings us closer to realizing your goals and vision. That's why we've created a 4-phase approach, ensuring clear management and meeting all expectations.
stepSection.buttonText: I want to get started right away!

step1.title: Step 1: Intake / Strategy
step1.content: We start with a strategic conversation about your brand, target audience, and goals. Together we determine the right approach, tone of voice, and segmentation so that every email perfectly aligns with your marketing strategy and truly resonates with your customers.

step2.title: Step 2: Implementation, Copywriting & Automation
step2.content: We set up the email platform, design compelling templates, and write conversion‑focused copy. Additionally, we build smart automations so that your emails reach the right recipient at the right time—fully on‑brand and efficient.

step3.title: Step 3: Test, test, test
step3.content: Before going live, we thoroughly test everything—from subject lines and send times to rendering on various devices. This ensures flawless emails that perform well and look great everywhere.

step4.title: Step 4: Analysis, Reporting, Optimization
step4.content: After sending, we monitor the results and analyze open rates, click behavior, and conversions. Based on this, we optimize the content and strategy—for continuously better results and long‑term success.

heroSection.title: Need strong video ads?
heroSection.subtitle: Expand the reach of your business
heroSection.page-no-stress: Never stress about maintaining social media again
heroSection.page-cost-savings: Cost savings through access to professional equipment
heroSection.page-trend-tracking: Never have to keep track of trends again

sectionTwo.title: So you guys are that
sectionTwo.subtitle: (Honestly, yes)
sectionTwo.paragraph1: Are you looking for a marketing partner who can help you achieve your business goals? At Achieve we look beyond our lens. In addition to shooting beautiful images, the goal of the video must also be achieved. Achieve specializes in creating promotional videos with a combined marketing/communication strategy.
sectionTwo.paragraph2: In addition to communication and marketing objectives, at Achieve we naturally also look at the attention value of the video itself. Maintaining the attention value of videos is crucial in a time when people's average attention span is getting shorter. In a world where we are constantly bombarded with information and distractions, it is essential that video content remains attractive and engaging to keep the viewer involved. To maintain the attention value of videos, it is important to consider various elements, such as the quality of the content, the style and pace of the video, the length and format of the video, the visual and auditory effects used, and so on. It is essential to understand the target audience and their interests to respond to this.
sectionTwo.paragraph3: Another USP is that once we have this visual material, we could use it for our other services, think of social media management, social media advertising!
sectionTwo.paragraph4: Discover how we can help you build emotional connections, increase your visibility and achieve your goals.

quoteSection.quote: "Marketing is no longer about the stuff that you make but about the stories you tell."
quoteSection.author: Seth Godin

discountSection.description: This month is the month of storytelling: 10% discount on video marketing that brings your vision to life

stepSection.description: Our approach is a proven effective process. Each step brings us closer to realizing your goals and vision. That's why we've created a 4-phase approach, ensuring clear management and meeting all expectations.
stepSection.buttonText: I want to start right away!

step1.title: Step 1: Vision & Positioning
step1.content: We start with a strategic conversation about your brand, target audience and goals. What do you want to convey with the video? Together we determine the tone of voice, style and message that best represents your brand. This way we lay a strong foundation for a video that really makes an impact.

step2.title: Step 2: Concept / Storyboard
step2.content: Based on the strategy, we develop a concrete concept and storyboard. Think of storyline, shots, locations and atmosphere. We ensure that the idea aligns with your brand identity and is appealing to your target audience — whether it's a brand video, social ad or corporate video.

step3.title: Step 3: Filming / Editing / Let's get started!
step3.content: Time to create! Our team gets to work on production: filming, directing and editing. We ensure professional footage, strong storytelling and a smooth edit that fits the platform and message. You can watch along and provide input where necessary.

step4.title: Step 4: Content Review & Delivery
step4.content: You receive the first version of the video and can share your feedback. After fine-tuning, we deliver the final video in the correct formats — ready for publication on your website, social media or ad campaign. Ready to score with powerful content.

projectsSection.title: Projects
projectsSection.description: Eliminate the barrier of cold ads, video tells the story that turns viewers into customers.
projectsSection.noProjectsMessage: No projects available at this moment.

heroSection.subtitle: It's much more than just content; let your customers become your most powerful ambassadors.
heroSection.ugc-authenticity: Authentic stories (real experiences, real emotions, real impact)

sectionTwo.paragraph1: You're active on social media, consistently posting content and spending money on ads. Yet, nothing seems to happen. The likes and comments you get feel empty — there’s no real connection with your brand. Meanwhile, your competitors seem to be thriving: their content gets engagement, they build trust, and customers choose them faster.
sectionTwo.paragraph2: It’s frustrating. It feels like you’re doing everything right, but the results just aren’t coming. You start wondering: what am I missing? Why does it work for others but not for me?
sectionTwo.paragraph3: The truth is simple: people trust people. Real experiences and authentic stories resonate far more than any polished ad or campaign ever could. That’s exactly where UGC marketing comes in.
sectionTwo.paragraph4: With our UGC packages, you don’t have to guess — you’ll see results right away:
sectionTwo.paragraph4item1: We find and match the right UGC creators for your brand.
sectionTwo.paragraph4item2: We handle contracts, agreements, and concept development.
sectionTwo.paragraph4item3: You receive professional UGC videos every month in the required formats.
sectionTwo.paragraph4item4: The videos can be used on both your channels and the creator’s, doubling your reach and credibility.

quoteSection.quote: "A brand is no longer what we tell the customer it is — it is what customers tell each other it is."
quoteSection.author: Scott Cook

discountSection.firstdescriptionPart: Turn your community into your strength: get
discountSection.seconddescriptionPart: 10% off UGC marketing that sells and connects.

stepSection.description: Our approach is a proven effective process. Each step brings us closer to realizing your goals and vision. That's why we've created a 4-phase approach, ensuring clear management and meeting all expectations.

step1.title: Step 1: Vision & Positioning
step1.content: We start with a conversation about your brand, target audience and objectives. Then we investigate which UGC creators best align with your goals. This ensures a perfect match and clear agreements with the creator(s).

step2.title: Step 2: Concept
step2.content: Our team translates your strategy into concrete ideas for UGC videos. We collaborate with the creator on authentic concepts that fit your brand, ensuring the content is suitable for various social‑media formats.

step3.title: Step 3: Feedback & Fine‑Tuning
step3.content: You receive the initial proposals and can give input on the edits. We incorporate your feedback and fine‑tune the content until it perfectly aligns with your vision and campaign.

step4.title: Step 4: Delivery
step4.content: The final UGC videos are delivered and can be posted to your own channels—and, if agreed, on the creators’ channels. You receive ready‑to‑use content that delivers maximum impact.

stepSection.buttonText: I want to start right away!
